User's Guide

The Pak User's Guide explains the following topics:

Topic Description
Quick Tour of Pak Basic Pak command usage.
Searching for Packages Using Pak to search for packages to isntall.
Customizing Packages Controlling how package files are installed.
Package Versions Package version syntax and expressions using SemVer.
Pak Profiles Defining development, test and production release profiles.
